overview_of_class: This course will familiarize students with the cinematic works of Andrei Tarkovsky and put his work in the context of both Soviet and World Cinema. Students will become proficient in the basic taxonomy of film study and some of the major trends of Post-War film theory. Filmmakers to be studied may include Tarkovsky, Eisenstein, Paradzhanov, De Sica, Kalatozov, Bresson and Klimov. Writings will include works by Bordwell & Thompson, Tarkovsky, Eisenstein, Bresson, Bazin, Epstein, Kracauer and Zavattini, among others.
